verbs.description: it [ARGM-TMP: time] to [V: boycott] [ARG1: saudi arabia the custodians of makkah] and madinahit time to boycott saudi arabia what good is our hajj or umrah pilgrimage if the host regime uses our money and the legitimacy that our visit provides to not only engage in perpetrating the greatest humanitarian crisis of our time but also to commit cold blooded murder of journalists for the ostensible purpose of squelching any dissent saudi arabia yemen saud jamal khashoggi madinah
